// This file is used as an example in the generated file kibana-settings-main.asciidoc
The following example shows a valid verbose `logging.root` configuration:
+
[source,text]
--
logging:
  appenders:
    console_appender:
      type: console
      layout:
        type: pattern
        highlight: true
  root:
    appenders: [console_appender]
    level: all
--
